SELECT ST_AsText(ST_ConvexHull(
    ST_Collect(
            ST_GeomFromText('MULTIPOINT(-118.28538432401638 34.0205622506377, -118.28928382071285 34.019345803623835, -118.28670638410604 34.01894597205277, -118.284114 34.024020, -118.28889529231776 34.02084271892348, -118.287521913327 34.0208694302584, -118.286456851223 34.020827141388445, -118.28403236321658 34.02027510660883, -118.28309962698329 34.02158669413378, -118.28412892825637 34.0223329400125, -118.28625070214183 34.02359047249489, -118.28852045360793 34.02279209814409, -118.28739484183052 34.03223031950047)')
            )) );
